Instance.description: Limits on the range at which modifiers can be applied

TunableList.name: Genders
TunableList.description: Trait allowed gender, empty set means not specified

Tunable.name: LimitDirectManip
Tunable.description: Maximum value that can be set for this modifier through direct manipulation (0 to 1).

Tunable.name: LimitRandomize
Tunable.description: Maximum value that can be set for this modifier through randomization (0 to 1).

Tunable.name: MinValue
Tunable.description: The minimum value that can be set for this modifier when changing a Sim's age. Default is 0. Note: If greater than 0, the opposite modifier also gets turned off automatically. Note 2: Cannot be less than 0.

Tunable.name: ModifierName
Tunable.description: Modifier name. This must be prefixed with the name of the .modifiers.xml where this modifier is defined. For example: 'yfHeadModifier_Brows_Arched' or 'ymHeadBelly_Big'.

Tunable.name: Offset
Tunable.description: An offset applied to this modifier for this age. Default is 0. Note: This also affects the opposite modifier - the offset is applied along the two-modifier slider. Note 2: This value cannot be less than 0. If you need to offset the modifier in the opposite direction, set the offset on the opposite modifier instead.

Tunable.name: Scale
Tunable.description: How much to scale this modifier for this age. Default is 1.0

TunableEnum.name: OccultType
TunableEnum.description: The occult type this modifier tuning is specific to.

TunableEnum.name: Species
TunableEnum.description: The species this modifier tuning is specific to.
